mapper.select: SELECT CATE_NAME, CATE FROM CHLCHL.PRODUCT WHERE PR_SPBKIND=#{code} GROUP BY CATE_NAME, CATE

SELECT PR.PR_SPCODE, SP.SP_NAME, PR.PR_CODE, PR.PR_NAME, PR.PR_IMAGE, PR.PR_PRICE, PR.PR_TAX, PR.PR_INFO, PR.PR_ORIGIN, PR.CATE, PR.CATE_NAME FROM PR INNER JOIN SP ON PR.PR_SPCODE = SP.SP_CODE WHERE PR_CODE=#{pr_code} AND PR_STCODE='PC'
SELECT * FROM CHLCHL.PRODUCT WHERE PR_NAME LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
SELECT PR_NAME FROM CHLCHL.PRODUCT WHERE PR_CODE=#{prcode} AND PR_STCODE='PC'
